channel.title: Spelljammer Lineages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Spelljammer Lineages"

item.title: Re: Spelljammer Lineages
item.content:encoded: Not a problem! Thanks for letting me know, just wanted to check if it was just a case of timeframe or if there was some other factor that I was just missing. And thank you for all the good work you do-this wiki has been a (metaphorical) lifesaver quite a few times!

item.title: Re: Spelljammer Lineages
item.content:encoded: Apologies! I'm usually one of the people that adds the new races and content when new books/UA gets released. I picked up my copy of Spelljammer a while back, but I've been just too busy with IRL stuff to update the site. I'll try and add the new lineages over the next week or two.

item.title: Spelljammer Lineages
item.content:encoded: Was going through the new Lineage page and noticed quite a few of the lineages from Spelljammer are still listed as part of the unearthed arcana section, despite having official release versions. Is there any particular reason for that or is it just a question of them not having been updated yet? (Also as a note, if anyone with edit perms needs me to send them the current versions from the Spelljammer book+errata let me know)
